$the day after this game, MLB announced that Ian Kinsler had scored from 2B on the play; this was not credited at the end of the game; Rajai Davis juggled the fly ball before catching it; both runners ran thinking the ball had been dropped; Kinsler's run was allowed because the Indians failed to appeal before both teams left the field; this changed the play to a sacrifice fly
